I have been shown that the principles that were given us in the early days of the message are to be regarded as just as important by our people today as they were then. There are some who have never followed the light given us on the question of diet. It is time now to take the light from under the bushel, and let it shine forth in clear, bright rays. 
     [NOT TO BE SERVED IN OUR SANITARIUMS--424, 431, 432] 
     [NOT TO BE SERVED TO HELPERS--432, 444] 
     [EXCESSIVE USE OF SWEET FOODS AS HARMFUL AS THE USE OF UNDISEASED FLESH MEAT--533, 556, 722]
